column2: Windows 10 Home basic, Firefox browser 94.0.2
Cheching
Clicking the "register" button opens the registration window
Clicking the "register by Email" button opens the registration window
Clicking the "register by SMS" button returns us back to the registration window
Field "Phone number" allows to enter only numbers
Clicking the "send code via SMS" button sends a code to a phone number
Clicking the "send code via SMS" button with an empty field "phone number" we see the inscription "enter the phone number"
Clicking the "Login" button opens the Login window
Clicking the "Login" button with an empty fields "e-mail adress" and "Password" we see that nothing is happening
Clicking the "Login" button with an right-filled fields "e-mail adress" and "password" we see that site is opens
Clicking the "Login" button with an wrong-filled fields "e-mail adress" and "password" we see thу inscription "Your account name or password is incorrect"
Clicking the "Login with social networks" button opens the new tab with authorization request
By entering any word into the search bar and pressing the search button, we get the search results
By entering any number into the search bar and pressing the search button, we see the inscription "Sorry, we did not find any items for your search "876845340654350". Please try searching again."
If we hover the mouse cursor over the "category" icon we see a pop-up window with a list of categories
By clicking on one of the categories in the list, we get to the page with products
Clicking on the "Cart" button opens a list of products added to the cart
Clicking on the product icon opens the product description page
Сlicking on the "Select All" button, all products in the basket are selected
clicking on the "buy" button, the order form window opens.
clicking on the "Add address" button a window pops up with a form for filling out the address
Clicking the "Checkout" button opens the payment page
